title: ‘I Could Really Fight:’ Resurgent Julian Alaphilippe on Strong 2024 Debut
content:
With debut Giro d'Italia and Paris Olympics two motivations, Frenchman's early momentum will help in bid to return to his best.

Read the full article at ‘I Could Really Fight:’ Resurgent Julian Alaphilippe on Strong 2024 Debut on Velo.
author: sstokes
